alert.note: Alert for Kauai North; Kauai Southwest; Niihau; Oahu North Shore; Waianae Coast (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued February 17 at 9:44AM HST until February 17 at 6:00PM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY FOR NORTH AND WEST FACING SHORES OF NIIHAU KAUAI OAHU AND WEST FACING SHORES OF THE BIG ISLAND... .The current west-northwest swell continues to generate elevated surf along most north and west facing shores this morning. This swell will continue to gradually lower throughout the day today. ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM HST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Surf of 10 to 16 feet along north facing shores, and 8 to 12 feet along west facing shores. * WHERE...North and west facing shores of Kauai, Niihau, and Oahu. * WHEN...Until 6 PM HST this evening. * IMPACTS...Moderate. Expect strong breaking waves, shore break, and strong longshore and rip currents making swimming difficult and dangerous.
info.instruction: Beachgoers, swimmers, and surfers should heed all advice given by ocean safety officials and exercise caution.

area.areaDesc: Kauai North; Kauai Southwest; Niihau; Oahu North Shore; Waianae Coast
